string.value: #b#p1032001##k starts talking to you. Has the #t4032467# been verified?
According to #p1032001#'s friend Tatamo, it's certain that #p1013000# is an Onyx Dragon. He asks that you come to #m240000000# if you want more details. Go to #b#m240000000#.#k.\r\n
You met Tatamo in #m240000000#. He was very happy to see #p1013000# and told you about Onyx Dragons and how they became extinct...

I finally heard back from Tatamo! He says the owner of the scale is definitely an Onyx Dragon! Since he's spent much of his life with Dragons and has raised a number of Baby Dragons, he can't be wrong.
Tatamo is very curious as to how you were able to find the scale of an Onyx Dragon. Honestly, I'm extremely curious myself, but I won't ask since you seem to want to keep it a secret.

Anyway, Tatamo has asked me to tell you that you should go see him in #m240000000# and discuss what you know about Onyx Dragons. He says he'll tell you what he knows about them as well. If you're interested, go over to #b#m240000000##k.

#m240000000# is a dangerous place. Monsters in #r#m240000000# are at least Lv. 70#k! if you don't feel comfortable battling monsters like that, #rdo not go out into the field.#k Be careful out there and come back safely.
Hm, I guess you're not that curious.
Have you not gone to Leafre yet? Tatamo is desperately waiting for the Onyx Dragon... I mean, you. He's desperately waiting for you.
